title: Person of interest | Root | Retrograde
author: Eyildr
comment: Root is hands down one of my favorite characters. She is so complex and adds excitement to the show.
great video! I would love to see more video about Root! She's a wonderful character.

Thank you so much - this is a great video! I adore Amy Acker and her character in POI from the very beginning. She's just hit the bull's-eye. Such a piercing and sharp play, so exquisite! Her ultimate charm and beauty are so mesmerizing, absolutely marvelous! Hope to see more of her in this show going forward. And of course - to see more great fan videos with her character too!
One of my favorite songs and my favorite character... Amazing work! :)
description:
Disclaimer: NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED

My tribute for Root (or Sam Groves) from Person of Interest. I really love this character and she's rather awesome. Please watch in HD!

Show: Person of Interest
Music: James Blake - Retrograde 

Coloring by hannacolours with some changes
